item.title: Command Troubles
item.dc:creator: @crashhim666 crashhim666
item.description:
@crashhim666 wrote:

which that would be where?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2009, 02:15:37 am[/size][hr]nvm ty i got it to work by modifying the code you gave earlier

For others the proper code is
[php]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staff”) && playerRights >= 1) {
triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, 0);
sM(“Welcome Home Staff.”);
}[/php]

XXXX = x coordinates
YYYY = y coordinates

item.title: Command Troubles
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Make it so it’s like this:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“barrowspure”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(737999, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(737999, 4);
addSkillXP(737999, 5);
addSkillXP(737999, 6);
sM(“You are now a barrows pure.”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staff”) && playerRights >= 1) {
teleportToX = 2441;
teleportToY = 3091;
sM(“Welcome Home Staff.”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“60defpure”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addSkillXP(0, 0);
addSkillXP(273999, 1);
addSkillXP(0, 2);
addSkillXP(273999, 3);
addSkillXP(0, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(0, 6);
sM(“You are now a 60 def pure.”);
}[/code]

I’m pretty sure that shoudl work, i edited it a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Command Troubles
item.dc:creator: @crashhim666 crashhim666
item.description:
@crashhim666 wrote:

I’m trying to make a teleport for mods and admins on my server, but everything I’ve tried to put has maked compiling fail.

[PHP]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staff”) && playerRights >= 1) {
teleportToX(2379);
teleportToY(9489);
sM(“Welcome Home Staff.”);[/PHP]

That is whati currently have in and I’ve tried just ToX & ToY, teleportToX=(2379) and all others.

Please a little help here.

Source is DDsspeced base.

Read full topic
